title: [Client] No longer POPS UP when your turn to pick/ban
body: I used to safely be able to alt tab during champion select; knowing that when my turn came to pick/ban, the client would pop up in front of anything I was doing (even full screen apps). This is no longer the case, the LoL icon will only glow orange to tell me when my queue has dropped due to my inactivity...
